phrases: What name do I give that feeling that was born that night?
Sweet words like love or adore just do not sound right.
Perhaps envy and irritation mixed in with jealousy.
And moreover, desire.
Even now I get anxious.
Because sometimes I feel that this daily life,
living together with Ren, is nothing but a dream.
Ren was a bright light that lightened the boring life I lived until then.
But no matter how hard I try, he still remains outta my reach.
Nana...
I am going to Tokyo.
You live your life however you like.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
Tokyo?
Whaddaya mean, Yasu?
Are you quitting university?
I thought you were going to be a lawyer.
No, not me.
Ren.
Remember that band Ren and I used to do gigs with
when we had our old band, Trapnest?
Trap?
Oh Trapnest!
They had the most awesome female vocalist!
Yeah, we got along real well.
Used to go out drinking and stuff.
Well, about two years ago I guess,
the whole bunch of'them went up to Tokyo looking to become pros.
Looks like they got a contract.
No kidding!
That is great!
I got to say, they were good, though.
But that contract... their debut...
apparently there were problems and the guitarist quit.
So the whole band got together and decided to call on Ren.
Ren's in Tokyo meeting producers this morning,
but they have already approved his guitar recordings,
so it is just like a get-together.
He is a member of the band, man.
Hey wait a minute...
It is not like he is moved there yet.
He will be back in town tomorrow.
But he is moving to Tokyo, right?!
What about Blast?!
What is going to happen to us?
We have only been together for a year and a half.
We are just getting into the groove...
Do not worry.
You can find bass players a dime a dozen.
We will find a replacement right away.
That is easy to say, but I do not buy it.
I feel like I have been double-crossed.
Hey man, Ren's been sitting around in town going nowhere.
Do not you think it is a waste?
Well then, why do not we all go to Tokyo with Ren
and venture into our professional career?!
Tokyo, look out for Blast!
Sorry, but I have no intention of making a living in music.
I do not want to gamble my life away like that.
Besides, if Ren goes to Tokyo, he should be playing with Trapnest.
Why?!
There is no guarantee that we will be able to get a contract anyway.
We can give it a try!
Hey, no matter how hard you try,
there are still a million out there who do not have the luck to make it.
I do not want Ren to be one of them.
Luck is moving in his favor.
He is got to make it, no matter what it takes.
It is not like just because Trapnest got a contract that they will sell...
No worries, man.
That band will sell.
Their sound and their looks shine.
You put Ren in there?
It is a done deal.
But!
Get over yourself!
If you want to go to Tokyo, then go!
But do not get in Ren's way!
Besides, you are taking after your dad's Terashima Inn!
That is probably why you are so carefree about this all.
You do not have to worry about a future.
Get over your sweet dreams about becoming professional
and work for your dad.
Being in a band is playtime.
Yeah maybe, but...
I am worried about Nana.
Is Ren going to, like, dump her and take off?
That is a screwed way of putting it.
Well then, he should take her with him!
What is that attitude?
Dump her or take her.
Nana is not some cat that belongs to Ren.
You know as much as I do that she is an independent woman.
She will go with him if she wants to.
That is something for Nana to decide.
I am sure that is how Ren thinks, too.
Yasu...
You are really mature.
You are the brat.
But I guess if Nana decides to go to Tokyo...
that is the end of Blast.
When that time comes, I am out.
Although I am going to miss this.
Time to get out.
You go and find another band to be friendly with, Nobu.
When I met Ren the second time,
it was mid-summer afternoon,
when the ocean breeze was biting my skin.
Hey Nobu, want to join our band?
Why?
What about the band you got now?
We are breaking up.
Those guys are hopeless.
They do not put their heart in it.
They do not practice, yet keep on complaining.
Hey, I heard that when you were in middle school
you used to play guitar in the school band,
and Ren used to talk about how good you were,
that it would be a total waste if you quit.
Huh?
I can play bass too, so why do not you play guitar?
I will do it!
Ah, but can we use a guy that is been out of practice for a year and a half.
No problem, Ren!
I still practice at home every day and I know all of your stuff!
I have lately started writing my own, too.
Well then, it is a go.
So who is going to do the vocals?
That is the problem.
Preferably a girl.
I am sick and tired of those dud guys.
I hear ya.
If she can sing at par, I would prefer a woman myself.
Nobu!
A woman!
Go find a woman
A pretty one at that.
So what am I?
A gofer already?
You got pretty women all around you!
Give me a break.
Try bringing in a woman that I have done it with.
They would only mean trouble.
If there is love, it should be all right.
Love, he says.
Those who laugh at love, cry for love.
Nobuo, there is a friend here to see you!
Miss Osaki!
Can I let her in?!
Yeah, sure!
Bring her through!
Osaki?
A girl?!
Is she pretty?
What?
Yeah, but you have met her before.
Nana.
Nobuo, here is the CDIborrowed.
Thanks.
Thanks.
Well, see ya.
Huh?
Hey, Nana!
Nobu, have you two ever gone out for karaoke?
Huh?
Is she good?
Well, yeah.
Average, I guess.
Then it is decided.
From that day on, I have witnessed the surf,
pulled by Ren's gravity.
The waves rush with the sound of my heart.
Higher, higher, higher.
Nana, sing in my band.
My feelings overflow and become my voice.
But I have not yet made it my choice, to sing for Ren.
I sing for myself...
as I always have.
Certificate of Graduation Nobuo Terashima
Certificate of Graduation Nobuo Terashima
How is that?
Make you jealous?
How is that?
Make you jealous?
Look.
I sold all the buttons on my uniform.
You got to give it to the guitarist that played for Blast.
How much do you think I got for the second button?
I cannot believe you took money for it.
Get outta here, shrimp.
I am busy.
You are lying.
This shop has no customers.
How are you busy?
I am busy reading!
Why do not you pick up a real book for a change,
instead of reading comics all the time?
I heard about Ren.
What are you going to do?
Of course, you are going to Tokyo with him, right?
Aha, so you have come to stop me.
You going to miss me?
Go!
Go to Tokyo!
I will come too!
What are you saying?
We will find new members in Tokyo and see how far we can get!
I realize it is not that simple to go pro,
but I think it is worth a try!
I think your singing is all right!
Not that you are super good or anything,
but you have a cool husky voice and I feel like taking a chance on it!
I do not want to play for anyone else.
That is probably how Yasu feels too.
That is why he is ready to give it all up if you go.
Why is it you telling me this?
Huh?
I wanted to hear those words from Ren.
Not you...
Thanks Nobu, but...
I am not going.
Why not?
Can you handle being separated from Ren?
Even if you cannot be in the same band you can at least live together!
No, I cannot do that!
It will be all right, Nana.
If you go with him,
he is not going to think of you as an obstacle.
That guy, who thinks he is God's gift to women,
has not fooled around on you once.
That is proof that he loves you.
I know that.
At least as long as you know.
However!
Making love with Ren is not the only thing I live for!
I, too, want to sing for a living.
So let us go to Tokyo!
Not now.
Why is that?!
Man, I do not understand you!
If I go now, I will end up living with Ren again.
I cannot live without him.
So why do not you?
If I do, Ren's going to be making it big time
in a band with a female vocalist that has a super voice,
while I sit around waiting for my break which may never happen,
making miso soup and waiting for Ren to come home.
No thanks, man.
That is totally degrading.
So I got to get better first.
Give myself the confidence that
I can make it singing without Ren's help.
One day for sure,
I am going to Tokyo, even if I go alone.
So bear with me, Nobu.
Stick around with me here for awhile.
You do not want to sing to another guy's guitar?
I do not care.
You do not want to sing...
I do not care.
Ren and I fell in love exactly a year after we met,
on Christmas night.
We were still feeling the excitement from our concert.
On the way home from the party afterwards...
we frolicked playfully, kidding around like little kids,
on the snow-covered sea wall.
Hey!
Far out!
A homemade cake!
Am I ever popular.
I am eating it.
There might be poison in that.
Actually it is from a fan of mine.
It is the you are making it with Ren so now you must die cake.
Then you taste it first.
I am not about to be killed for something I did not do.
No way, man.
It was so sudden I forgot to close my eyes.
Now that we are guilty, maybe I would not mind getting killed.
I seriously thought I would not mind dying.
Because I longed for Ren.
I wanted him so badly...
always, from that day on.
I thought no one was supposed to lay a hand on Nana,
because that would only because problems in the band.
No worries.
There is love.
Right here.
You got to be kidding me.
We did not waste any time moving in together.
Ren Honjo Nana Osaki
We did not waste any time moving in together.
Ren Honjo Nana Osaki
Ren showed me the joy of singing.
He taught me how to play the guitar.
He gave me the desire to live.
But what have I been able to do for him?
Even if it means I would not sing anymore,
I could go to Tokyo with Ren and at least cook for him every day...
polish the apartment, and have his child...
Maybe that is what I should do.
After all, that is plenty happiness in itself.
For those of us who have no family,
the most important thing...
more than making some dream come true...
has got to be making a home.
Is that all ya got?
Yep.
Just give me my guitar and some cigarettes and I am happy.
He is lying.
He sent all his stuff ahead.
Says he does not like carrying heavy stuff.
From now on, you will not have guys below you to carry your stuff for you.
I can already see what Ren's poor assistant
is going to have to suffer through.
I guess it is about time.
A year and three months of living with Ren.
In the beginning of spring before the snow completely melted away,
our story ended.
We did not say goodbye.
But living apart would be the end of us and we knew that.
Phone calls and letters are worthless.
It does not mean a thing if you cannot be there to hold each other in your arms.
Each night, I could feel his sadness within me...
as he spilled it out without words.
I felt it deeper than anyone else could ever do.
Merry Christmas!
We are Blast.
At times, I still regret what happened.
I sometimes feel that this everyday life without Ren is all part of a dream.
Especially on these nights when the snow falls heavily.
On a cold night like tonight, someone, please keep him warm.
Nana, I bought the CD you released.
It is the greatest!
Your songs give me courage to get through the day.
Your lyrics touch me deep inside.
I hope more and more people will listen to your songs.
I would be lonely if you became famous, Nana.
Because look at Ren.
He is super popular now.
I am happy for him, but I have mixed feelings.
But I forgive him because he is cool.
Do you still keep in touch with Ren?
Say hi to him for me.
Best wishes.
I am rooting for you.
AKIKO P.S. I love your latest hairstyle.
It is so grown up.
Maybe I will do the same.
To Nana From Misato
It is sweet.
It is been a year and nine months since Ren and I separated.
Soon, the second spring will come.
In March, on my twentieth birthday,
I am going to go out and buy me a present, to congratulate myself for hanging on.
A one way ticket to Tokyo.
Just give me my guitar and some cigarettes, and I am happy.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
